lines.text:
[singing]
Oh, I'm a ropin' and a ridin' and a shootin' fool. Oh, I'm as tough and ornery, meaner than a rawhide mule. Oh, I'm as quick as greasy lightnin' when I go for my gun. Reach... A-hyuck! Ya mangy buzzards, reach for the sun.

[slightly startled by a wanted poster for Pete]
It's a darn good thing you ain't real.
'Cause you was, I'd get the drop on ya!
[fires his gun; the bullet ricochets about the environment before finally bouncing off the poster]

[guffaws]
And drill ya right between your eyes!
